channel.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

item.title: [GRA1][Dedicated Servers] - Rack G135B18
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jul 23, 00:00 - 02:00 UTC

Jun 3, 16:17 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our public and private networks (Vrack) in the rack G135B18.

Start time : 23/07/2025 00:00 UTC
End time : 23/07/2025 02:00 UTC
Service impact : Public and private networks (Vrack) will be temporarily unavailable for servers located in the specified rack during the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on a network equipment.

Thank you for your understanding.

During the maintenance period, your data will remain available.

item.title: [SYD1][Virtual Private Servers] - Workflow Management service maintenance notification
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jul 9, 14:00 - 15:00 UTC

Jul 3, 14:14 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Workflow Management service, Mistral.

Here are the details of the maintenance:
Start time : 09/07/2025 14:00 UTC
End time : 09/07/2025 15:00 UTC
Service impact : During this maintenance window for the Workflow Management service (Mistral), you may encounter the following impacts :

Workflows in progress at the start of the maintenance will be stopped and will be restarted automatically after the maintenance is completed. We understand that this may cause a temporary disruption in your workflow processing, and we apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
Cron triggers (scheduled workflow executions) during the maintenance period will not be triggered. If you have any workflows scheduled to run during the maintenance window, we recommend rescheduling them to run outside of this timeframe to avoid any disruption.

Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be performing a maintenance on the Mistral service infrastructure. This maintenance is necessary to ensure the continued reliability and performance of our platform.

If you have any questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out to our support team.

item.title: [Global][Virtual Private Servers] - Images EoL notification
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jul 4, 09:00 UTC  -  Aug 4, 21:00 UTC

Jul 3, 13:05 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Virtual Private Servers offer.

Start time : 04/07/2025 09:00 UTC
End time : 04/08/2025 21:00 UTC
Service impact : Below-mentioned images will no longer be available to purchase or use.

Several images currently offered as part of our VPS offering have reached, or are approaching, End of Life (EoL). As of August 4th, 2025, these images will be officially removed from our VPS catalog in accordance with our End of Life policy. You can read more about our distribution End of Life policy here : https://help.ovhcloud.com/csm/en-gb-public-cloud-compute-vps-image-life-cycle?id=kb_article_view&sysparm_article=KB0050801

Below is the complete list of images, as well our recommendations and alternatives for VPS environments.
EoL DistributionEoL / EoS dateAlternative DistributionRecommended action
Centos 730/06/2024AlmaLinux/ Rocky LinuxBackup and upgrade distribution
Fedora 3705/12/2023Fedora 42Backup and upgrade distribution
Fedora 3821/05/2024Fedora 42Backup and upgrade distribution

If you use automation to deploy your infrastructure with any of these images, we strongly recommend that you either switch to another distribution or upload your own image to use instead. You can refer to the following guides to :
Upgrade operating system: https://help.ovhcloud.com/csm/en-gb-public-cloud-compute-upgrade-operating-system?id=kb_article_view&sysparm_article=KB0051306
Upload your image: https://help.ovhcloud.com/csm/en-gb-public-cloud-compute-upload-own-image?id=kb_article_view&sysparm_article=KB0051319

Service improvement : As part of our End of Life policy, the above-mentioned images will no longer be available for purchase or reinstallation in our VPS offering.

For any question, please reach out to our support team.
Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [GRA1][Dedicated Servers] - Racks G132B13
item.description:
Jul 4, 07:16 UTC
Identified - We are currently experiencing an incident affecting our Dedicated Servers offering, which is causing temporary availability issues in the racks G133A12.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 04/07/2025 05:53 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Some servers racks G132B13 are temporarily unavailable.
Customers Impact : Some customers are temporarily unable to access their servers located on the specified racks.
Root Cause : This incident is caused by a cooling system issue.
Ongoing Actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident to fix it.Â 

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.
